Dec 14 (Reuters) - 3i Group PLC III.L:: *3I GROUP PLC - DIRECTORATE CHANGE *3I GROUP - JASI HALAI, CURRENTLY GROUP FINANCIAL CONTROLLER, WILL JOIN GROUP BOARD AS CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER IN MAY 2022
